# */
import sys 

t=input()
for i in range(0,t):
    n=input()
    x=str(n)
    count=0
    while(x!=x[::-1]):
        count+=1
        su=int(x)+int(x[::-1])
        x=str(su)
    print "%d %s" %(count,x)
